org.mrpdaemon.sec.comp

Class Compatibility

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mrpdaemon.sec.comp.Compatibility

  • public final class Compatibility
extends Object
    Includes several methods that are not available in Java 1.5 and had to be replaced to make the tool compatible with 1.5. Parts of the code are copied from the OpenJDK Source Code
    Author:
    Samuel Moosmann @ TripleIn software solutions GmbH
